## Compiler class

Wepback compilation controller class

Signature:

```typescript
export declare class Compiler extends Service implements Contract
```

Extends: Service

Implements: Contract

## Properties

| Property                                            | Modifiers | Type                    | Description                              |
| --------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| [config](/api/bud-compiler/compiler/config)         |           | any                     |                                          |
| [errors](/api/bud-compiler/compiler/errors)         |           | Array&lt;StatsError&gt; | Compiler errors                          |
| [instance](/api/bud-compiler/compiler/instance)     |           | Contract.Instance       | Compiler instance                        |
| [isCompiled](/api/bud-compiler/compiler/iscompiled) |           | boolean                 | True if compiler is already instantiated |
| [progress](/api/bud-compiler/compiler/progress)     |           | Contract.Progress       | Compilation progress                     |
| [stats](/api/bud-compiler/compiler/stats)           |           | StatsCompilation        | Compilation stats                        |

| Method                                                | Modifiers | Description                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- |
